text: Arlington is a city in Tarrant County, Texas, United States. It is in the Dallas-Fort Worth-Arlington metropolitan area. Arlington has AT&T; Stadium, Globe Life Field, Texas Live, Six Flags, the United States Bowling Congress Nuclear Regulatory Commission Region IV and American Mensa. == Famous people from Arlington == *Maren Morris (1990-), singer == References == == Other websites == * City's Official Website
title: Arlington, Texas
